page.description: Read a line from the file.
page.discussion: The .READ_LINE() method retrieves text data from the current file offset to the end of the line (marked by a carriage return and line feed ). The file from which data is read is specified by the object pointer, . The .READ_LINE() method returns a string of input characters, not including the and codes.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script will view the contents of a text file.
section.example: filename = UI_GET_FILE("Choose File", "Text File (*.txt)", "c:\a5\data\variable.txt", "X") if (filename = "") then end end if file_pointer = file.open(filename, FILE_RO_SHARED) while .NOT. file_pointer.eof() text = file_pointer.read_line() trace.writeln(text) end while file_pointer.close()
